data.title: Donna Summer passes away in North Naples :( (Key West, Englewood: home, live)
meta_keywords: Donna Summer passes away in North Naples :(
data.meta_description: I loved her music Disco queen, North Naples resident Donna Summer dies at 63 Â» Naples Daily News
data.text:
05-17-2012, 08:23 PM

Location: Lakewood NJ/Murrells Inlet SC/ N. Naples FL/Swainton NJ

4,026 posts, read 6,540,797 times

Reputation: 3531

As I stated on my Facebook page, I actually cried when they covered the news of her untimely death on the evening news. I had no idea she resided in North Naples. Does anyone know where exactly? I want to add to the flowers next time I am in town..........

"Last Dance" will always be one of my top ten songs!

05-17-2012, 08:24 PM

1,394 posts, read 2,087,806 times

Reputation: 1362

According to the article, she lived in Tiburon..... Who knew? Tremendous talent, and part of the soundtrack of my youth.... What a loss! RIP Donna!

05-17-2012, 08:27 PM

Location: Lakewood NJ/Murrells Inlet SC/ N. Naples FL/Swainton NJ

4,026 posts, read 6,540,797 times

Reputation: 3531

Quote:

Originally Posted by Tripower455

According to the article, she lived in Tiburon..... Who knew? Tremendous talent, and part of the soundtrack of my youth.... What a loss! RIP Donna!

Wish I had known. I walk by the enterance to Tiburon everyday when I am in Naples........

05-18-2012, 08:12 AM

1,581 posts, read 3,371,973 times

Reputation: 761

Our local news said she and her husband resided in Englewood, a home on the beach in Manasota Key.

05-18-2012, 01:47 PM

Location: Watkinsville, GA

388 posts, read 1,125,297 times

Reputation: 451

I read an article yesterday that stated she passed away at her home in Key West.

Guess not.

RIP.

The first time I ever went to a strip club(Tattletale in Atlanta, 1978, I was 16), Bad Girl by Donna Summer was playing.

Funny, 8 years later I was married to a dancer from Tattletale.

For some reason, it didn't last.

Donna Summer Bad Girls (Disco 70s) - YouTube
